trans-unit.source: Represents a stylus tip shaped like an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 表示手寫筆筆尖圖案近似橢圓型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape>並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A>方法，以清除部分<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>呼叫`eraseTester`且其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit>事件已連接到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要建立可讓使用者清除筆墨的控制項，請參閱[How to： 自訂控制項上清除的筆墨](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape>並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A>方法，以清除部分<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>呼叫`eraseTester`且其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit>事件已連接到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要建立可讓使用者清除筆墨的控制項，請參閱[How to： 自訂控制項上清除的筆墨](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆圖形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆圖形的高度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> class with the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寬度和高度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape>並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A>方法，以清除部分<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>呼叫`eraseTester`且其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit>事件已連接到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要建立可讓使用者清除筆墨的控制項，請參閱[How to： 自訂控制項上清除的筆墨](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆圖形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆圖形的高度。

trans-unit.source: The angle of the stylus shape.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆圖形的角度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> class with the specified width, height, and angle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寬度、高度和角度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Ink.EllipseStylusShape>並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A>方法，以清除部分<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>呼叫`eraseTester`且其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit>事件已連接到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要建立可讓使用者清除筆墨的控制項，請參閱[How to： 自訂控制項上清除的筆墨](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)。
